seo_keywords: Hoover SmartWash not picking up water

problems.title: FlexForce Brushes Not Spinning
problems.description: The two rollers at the bottom are stationary.
solution_steps: Pull out the brushes (they pull straight up).

problems.title: Leaking Water
solution_steps: Reseat both clean and dirty tanks.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a SmartWash Automatic Carpet Cleaner (FH52000)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $301 vacuum, and extending the life of your Hoover is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my SmartWash Automatic Carpet Cleaner (FH52000) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my SmartWash Automatic Carpet Cleaner (FH52000) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
